title: Can riot undo this?
body: So I wanted to play a game with my friend and I got bug splat so I was forced to restart client and then my client had to update and I missed whole game now I have leave buster.

replies.body:
Only way to get rid of leaverbuster/low priority queue is to play through it.

if it help, player VS AI  and I believe also ARAM will count, which is good since they're fast game modes.

We cannot remove Leaverbuster penalties, no. The system was designed this way so we cannot abuse the system in any capacity.

Bugsplats are caused by driver or hardware issues, so I'd recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to prevent this issue from occurring again. If you have any further issues with this, please let me know.
